body.name: LIKIMIO Queen Bed Frame, Platform Bed Frame with 2-Tier Storage Headboard and Strong Support Legs, More Sturdy, Noise-Free, No Box Spring Needed, Vintage Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 16 - 21. Order within 3 hrs 25 mins.
features: Practical 2-Tier Shelf Headboard - The headboard storage rack of the bed can provide you with a place for your phone, glasses, and books when you go to sleep.
Sturdy Construction - Heavy Strong metal support frames, providing optimum support for all types of mattresses without the use of a box spring.

Save Space and Time - 10.6" under-bed clearance provides extra storage space. Each part of the queen platform bed is clearly labeled and numbered on each and you just need to match those numbers in order to assemble.
Industrial Style - P2 high-quality MDF board & black metal. Has kind of a mild industrial look to it without being overly trendy. Very suitable for your bedroom. Dimensions : L*W*H: 86.6 * 60.2 * 39"

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Storage Headboard--More Convenient 10.4 Space Under the Bed - More Tidy

Enhance Your Sleeping Experience Sturdy and Multipurpose Queen Size Bed Frame with Headboard Looking for a bed frame that can provide a comfortable and stylish sleeping experience? Our likimio queen bed frame is just what you need. Constructed with sturdy and durable materials, this bed frame ensures lasting comfort and support. The storage headboard adds extra convenience, allowing you to relax and unwind after a long day. With easy assembly and simple maintenance, this bed frame is hassle-free and ready to use in no time.

Color Vintage Brown Material Metal Supports, MDF Headboard Queen Bed Frame Dimension 86.6"L x 60.2"W x 39"H Headboard Shelf Size 60.2*5.5 Support Legs 9 Under-bed Storage 10.4 Weight Capacity 880 Noise-Free Yes No Box Spring Needed Yes
Quick Installation Sturdy Construction Safe Arc Corner Design Strong Metal Supports

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed frame
reviews.reviewText: Nice, sturdy bed. Very easy to assemble. Like that I only needed to buy a mattress without box spring. Also with the built-in shelf I was able to eliminate night stands. We had to buy some foam to cover the side legs, because we kept kicking them when walking around the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We just put this together, my and my sister did it, It was pretty easy to do it. I am not a builder of any sort and it took us about 2 hours to figure it all out and put it together It looks and feels very sturdy and the shelf it has is a little smaller than what she was hoping but its cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and looks like picture!
reviews.reviewText: The rustic maple is even prettier in person! The frame itself is very sturdy and was quite easy to put together (2 helps but I honestly think I could've done it by myself). My only complaints are a lack of any type of barrier at the head to stop the mattress from sliding back, and that I wish the middle legs were a little further under the bed because they are right at the edge and are lethal to toes. Overall though I'm quite happy with this bed and impressed with the quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this bed (King) for my teen son. It was straightforward to put together for my husband, but he is pretty handy. The bed is VERY sturdy and a much better quality than I assumed I would receive for the price. Much better than you get from some of the box stores. It is really pretty in person and I absolutely would purchase another if/when we need another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks, and functions just as shown in the photos
reviews.reviewText: Love my bed frame! Super sturdy! It was pretty simple to set up. Everything's organized well and labeled. Instructions are easy to read. All the dimensions and measurements are exact. The back frame holds a lot of stuff so if you are like me, and want to put your phone, lotions, tissues, etc it is perfect. Even if you shake the bed your items will not fall off.No need for drawers there is more then enough room under the bed for containers to slide under. I have 4 on each side of the bed that stores a good portion of my things. Highly recommend this bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: Packaged well, each piece labeled, simple instructions, easy to put together (easier w/ battery-powered drill & a hex bit). Once everything is tight, it is sturdy & squeek-free. Looks great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: Looks exactly as it did online! Very easy set up. It took my partner 2 hours to set up the frame from start to finish by herself! Lightweight and easy to move around the room, but very sturdy and reliable! 10/10 would recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple rustic bedframe.
reviews.reviewText: First off the colors. Its exactly what I was looking for in a bed! It really tied the room together. It was fairly easy to assemble, just make sure you follow directions.Everything is well marked.Relatively affordable for an adult bedframe.It's only five inches across on the "shelves"And only 5 inches between the two shelves.I would double check everything before you buy (see below)To whom it may concern, if your wrote about the bed not lining up you probably tighten down the bolts prematurely. You should hand screw everything into place (long screws maybe a bit more).Once you walk through all the instructions go back and retighen everything.I would say after you complete the headboard you can tighten that down pretty well (if your sticking it in a corner and it's hard to move).Also pay special attention to the bolts that go from the frame to the headboard.Overall pretty quiet but any noise came from that area. Retighen them again and good as new.If the middle support bar doesn't reach the ground (like mine) you can add a sliver of wood( can't think of the name right now)But super easy,super cheap. At all major stores even Walmart.The sticky corner pads will absolutely not stay after the blanket knocks them off once.Bring your own tape or get creative with some pool noodles (if u don't care how it looks) 🤘🤘.As far ash shipping.. not great.Didn't get the item at first had to ask neighbors Ect.Did end up with someone elses from another company.I ordered another one since I was convinced the first one wouldn't be coming home to me and my mattress was taking Alot of room as it aired out to it's final form(24-48 hours)!!Now going through the process of trying to return the second frame that isn't due for 2-5 day. Fingers crossed they can stop it so I get a full refund.If not they offered to let me sell it or give it away and give me 50$ back.... We'll see how it goes but so far the customer service has been amazing and on top of it.After some issues with shipping (from the company they use, not likimio) I finally received and assembled this bad boy. It's a bit smaller the I expected as far as the "shelves" and the over all height. Double check your measurements
